config.urlHelpText: The complete ArgoCD webhook endpoint url, e.g.: "https://my-argo.cloudogu.net/api/webhook"
config.secretHelpText:
Optional GitHub Secret for ArgoCD webhooks. The same secret must be configured as GitHub secret inside the ArgoCD secret in your cluster. 
Guide: https://github.com/argoproj/argo-cd/blob/master/docs/operator-manual/webhook.md
